Room.Name: Evenborough Way/Islandia Drive Intersection
Room.ShortDescription: You are at the intersection of Islandia Drive and Evenborough Way.
Room.LongDescription: Islandia Drive runs east towards the main entrance to Lyanden Castle and west towards the Bendine Aquarium. It also passes by numerous shops and facilities providing services to the citizens. Evenborough Way runs north towards the Northern Entrance to the city, and south towards the Lithium Inlet.
